DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study ass compare pharmacokinetics ( PK ) Tiotropium deliver via Breath Actuated Inhaler ( BAI ) ( 4.5 mcg/day 9.0 mcg/day ) , SPIRIVA® , HandiHaler® , ( 18 mcg/day ) Respimat® Soft Mist™ Inhaler ( SMI ) ( 5.0 mcg/day ) follow repeat dose 7 day subject COPD .
DOC.brief_title: To Compare Pharmacokinetics Tiotropium Subjects With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD )
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter study consist Screening Visit ( 3 14 day prior randomization ) ; 4 multiple-dose ( 7-day ) Treatment Periods , consist 2-night/3-day inpatient stay ( Day 6 Day 8 ) ; Final Visit . A washout period least 21 day occur Treatment Period . The Final/ Early Termination Visit occur 6-8 day follow last Treatment Period upon early discharge study .
